S-01.title: ABYSSAL SCOOP
S-01.desc: Extreme fear (RSI L1) + Large whale accumulation + Volume explosion. Perfect bottom.

S-02.title: LEVIATHAN DUMP
S-02.desc: Peak of euphoria (RSI L10) - whales are dumping their holdings.

S-03.title: WHALE TORPEDO
S-03.desc: Compressed energy (Squeeze) released upward by whales.

S-04.title: HULL CRACK
S-04.desc: Major support breach + Whale dump + Volume-backed decline.

A-01.title: SMART DIVERGENCE
A-01.desc: Price falling but whales quietly accumulating. (Time-weighted analysis)

A-02.title: EXIT DIVERGENCE
A-02.desc: Price rising but whales quietly exiting. (Time-weighted analysis)

A-03.title: FULL THROTTLE
A-03.desc: All engines go. Strong uptrend riding the upper band.

B-01.title: BB Squeeze Zone
B-01.desc: Bollinger Bands strong contraction (L1-L2) + Volume drop. Volatility compression zone.

B-03.title: MACD Golden Cross
B-03.desc: MACD Golden Cross + Volume increase. Technical pattern confirmed.

guide.pageSubtitle: From whale tracking to alert systems and trading simulator - master all features

whale.tierDesc: Classifies large transactions over $10M into 7 tiers. SubMarine's custom linear system.
whale.flowDesc: Classifies whale transaction directions into 5 types to understand market impact.

timeWeighted.title: Time-Weighted Analysis (Updated 2025-11-22)
timeWeighted.problem: Problem: Past whale Inflow + Current price decline â†’ False signal
timeWeighted.problemDesc: If whales made large Inflows (exchangeâ†’wallet) 12 hours ago, but prices are now falling? Old data distorts current analysis.
timeWeighted.solution: Solution: Higher weight for recent transactions
timeWeighted.solutionDesc: 1 hour ago transactions get 85%, 6 hours ago 37%, 12 hours ago only 14%. This aligns price changes with whale activity.
timeWeighted.hour1Desc: Very high impact - Recent whale activity
timeWeighted.exampleSituation: Situation: BTC price is currently falling
timeWeighted.exampleNote: Recent Outflow has greater impact than past Inflow.
timeWeighted.keyPointDesc: Time-weighted analysis accurately captures whale activity "momentum". It minimizes the impact of old data and provides analysis that is temporally aligned with current market conditions.

rsi.title: RSI (Relative Strength Index)
rsi.desc: Relative Strength Index. Classifies 0-100 range into 10 levels for precise overbought/oversold detection.

macd.title: MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence)
macd.desc: Moving Average Convergence Divergence. Classifies momentum strength into 7 levels based on Histogram.

bb.title: Bollinger Bands
bb.desc: Volatility indicator. Analyzes market conditions using BB Width and Price Position.
bb.squeezeNote: Extremely low volatility â†’ Big move imminent. Follow breakout direction immediately
bb.expansionNote: Volatility surge â†’ Strong trend. Trend-following strategy valid (watch for overheating)
bb.upperWalkNote: Strong uptrend continuing. Early: enter, Late: tight stop-loss
bb.lowerWalkNote: Strong downtrend continuing. Early: enter, Late: tight stop-loss

alertsSection.title: Alert System
alertsSection.desc: 12 key alert combinations capture all important market moments. Prioritized as S tier (most critical) â†’ A tier (high) â†’ B tier (medium).

s01.name: ABYSSAL SCOOP (Deep Sea Pickup)
s01.desc: Extreme low + Large whale inflow = Historic buying opportunity

s02.name: LEVIATHAN DUMP
s02.desc: Extreme high + Large whale outflow = Major drop imminent

s03.name: WHALE TORPEDO
s03.desc: Volatility compression â†’ Upper breakout + Whale inflow = Explosive rise
s03.cond3: Strong MACD bullish momentum + Whale inflow $20M+

s04.name: HULL CRACK
s04.desc: Volatility compression â†’ Lower breakout + Whale outflow = Crash begins
s04.cond3: Strong MACD bearish momentum + Whale outflow $20M+

aTier.title: High Priority Alerts (3) - High Profit Potential

a01.name: SMART DIVERGENCE
a01.desc: Price falling but whales inflowing = Smart money accumulation (time-weighted analysis applied)
a01.cond3: Mega whale participation ($200M+) + RSI at low levels

a02.name: EXIT DIVERGENCE
a02.desc: Price rising but whales outflowing = Smart money exit strategy
a02.cond3: Mega whale participation ($200M+) + RSI at high levels

a03.name: FULL THROTTLE
a03.desc: Upper band walking + Strong MACD = Sustained uptrend

b01.name: BB SQUEEZE
b01.desc: Extremely low volatility = Big move imminent, enter after direction confirmed

b02.name: RSI OVERBOUGHT
b02.desc: RSI overheated = Correction possible, consider taking profits on longs

b03.name: MACD GOLDEN CROSS
b03.desc: MACD turns bullish = Upward momentum starts, confirm with other indicators

filtersSection.title: Filters & Settings
filtersSection.desc: Timeframe, symbol selection, and hidden developer tools - complete settings guide

timeframe.title: Timeframe Selection
timeframe.1hDesc: Short-term trading, day trading. Whale lifespan: 3 hours. Indicator sensitivity: High (volatile)
timeframe.4hDesc: Swing trading. Whale lifespan: 12 hours. Indicator sensitivity: Medium (balanced)
timeframe.8hDesc: Position trading. Whale lifespan: 24 hours. Indicator sensitivity: Low (stable)
timeframe.1dDesc: Long-term trend analysis. Whale lifespan: 30 days. Indicator sensitivity: Very low (big picture)
timeframe.tipDesc1: Shorter timeframe = More signals, more noise
timeframe.tipDesc2: Longer timeframe = Fewer signals, but higher reliability

symbol.title: Symbol Filter
symbol.warningDesc1: Individual symbol: Track whale activity for that coin only
symbol.warningDesc2: All (Combined): Integrated whale activity across all crypto
symbol.warningDesc3: Combined mode useful for overall market sentiment
symbol.warningDesc4: For specific coin trading, select individual symbol

mute.title: Mute Settings
mute.desc: Toggle alert sounds on/off with the ðŸ”Š/ðŸ”‡ button in the filter bar at the top of the main page.
mute.note2: Alerts still display on screen when muted
mute.note3: Only sound is blocked, features work normally

tradingSection.title: Trading Simulator
tradingSection.desc: Practice virtual trading with real Binance data. No real money is used!

warning.title: Important: This is a Simulator
warning.point1: Uses virtual USDT, not real money
warning.point5: Real trading may require different strategies

howTo.title: How to Trade
howTo.step1Desc: Click the login button on the trading page to create an account. Starting balance: 10,000 USDT (virtual)
howTo.step2Desc: View real-time BTC/USDT price on the left chart.
howTo.step2Colors: Green candle = Up, Red candle = Down
howTo.step4LongDesc: Expect price to rise. Ex: $80,000 â†’ $85,000 (+$5,000 profit)
howTo.step4ShortDesc: Expect price to fall. Ex: $80,000 â†’ $75,000 (+$5,000 profit)
howTo.step5Desc: Adjust leverage with the slider. Higher leverage = higher profits but also higher losses!
howTo.step5Example1: 1x: 100 USDT â†’ 100 USDT position (1% price increase = 1 USDT profit)
howTo.step5Example2: 10x: 100 USDT â†’ 1,000 USDT position (1% price increase = 10 USDT profit)
howTo.step5Example3: 100x: 100 USDT â†’ 10,000 USDT position (1% price increase = 100 USDT profit)
howTo.step6Desc: Enter the BTC quantity to trade. Use the slider to select 25% / 50% / 75% / 100% of your balance.
howTo.step6Formula: Max Buy = (Balance Ã— Leverage) / Current Price
howTo.step7Desc: Click Long or Short button to execute. Market orders fill immediately, Limit orders wait in Orders tab.

positionManagement.title: Position Management
positionManagement.pnl: PnL: Profit and Loss - Real-time calculation
positionManagement.ordersNote3: Market orders execute immediately, not shown here
positionManagement.historyDesc: Past trade records and PnL history
positionManagement.pnlLong: Long: Profit when price rises, loss when falls
positionManagement.pnlShort: Short: Profit when price falls, loss when rises
positionManagement.pnlNote: â€» Higher leverage = larger PnL swings

ranking.title: Ranking System
ranking.desc: Compete with other users on returns! Climb to the top of the leaderboard.

riskWarning.title: Risk Warning
riskWarning.risk1Desc: Completely different from real exchanges. Real trading has slippage, fees, funding costs, and liquidation risk.
riskWarning.risk2Desc: High leverage amplifies losses too. High leverage in real trading can result in instant liquidation.
riskWarning.risk3Desc: Profits in the simulator don't guarantee the same results in real trading. Study thoroughly before real trading.
riskWarning.risk4Desc: This tool is provided for educational purposes. Investment decisions are your own responsibility.

footer.disclaimer: This service is not investment advice.
